participant_1.background:
I value the memories I've made with my friends and family.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
My children are my only living family members.
i now live in new mexico.
I am looking for a partner who is willing to be a parent to my children.

participant_2.background:
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
i just bought my first home.
i love my job.

content.text: Hey there, I'm new to the area and looking for friends.
Hi there, I just moved into the area myself, maybe we can hang out sometime?
That would be great! What are some of your hobbies?
I love music, I play in a band and I'm really looking forward to playing at a local music festival.
That sounds awesome! I love to go to music festivals.
Me too! I'm also really into fashion, I love wearing bright colors and patterns, it makes me feel more confident and energetic.
I love that! I love to experiment with different styles of fashion.
We should definitely hang out sometime! We seem to have a lot in common.
Sounds great! I'm free this weekend, maybe we could go to the park or something?
That sounds perfect! I'll bring a picnic lunch!
